Level.campaign: Actual Lizard Tactics Jam Map for Pride
Level.Script: Randomize Villagers SetList/Villager Spritesets,Villager_Boy|Villager_Girl|Villager_Male|Villager_Female|Villager_FemaleOld|Villager_MaleOld|Villager_BoyAlt|Villager_GirlAlt|VillagerDese_Male|VillagerDese_Female|VillagerDese_Boy|VillagerDese_Girl SetVal/NamedVillagers,=:-1 Run/Give Villagers Unique Names,Replace Me Name,Rubble Rouser Golem Run/Give Villagers Unique Sprites

Give Villagers Unique Names Log/All "-STR:Replace Me Name-"s on the map will have their name set to a unique value, by incrementing an index. This way they can be targeted by SetStat better. SetVal/NamedVillagers,+:1 IfPresentRun/-STR:Replace Me Name-,_SetStatString,Character Name,-STR:Replace Me Name-,Stat Name,Name,Value,Villager-VAL:NamedVillagers-, Log/Recursively run this again if there are still -STR:Replace Me Name- IfPresentRun/-STR:Replace Me Name-,Give Villagers Unique Names

Give Villagers Unique Sprites Log/After Give Villagers Unique Names, there should be villagers named Villager0->X. Iterate over each name and set a random sprite. ForLoop/-ii-,0--VAL:NamedVillagers-,1,Run,Give Villager Random Sprite,Villager Index,-ii-
Set Alive Unit IfValRun/-STR:Character Name- Alive,=,0,_RemoveUnit,Character Name,-STR:Character Name-

Dialogue.Branch: / HideDialogueBox/ ZoomCam/8 Run/Randomize Villagers MoveCam/5,5,,1 Run/Set Alive Unit,Character Name,Harrien Lifts Run/Set Alive Unit,Character Name,Nobeta Lifts Run/Set Alive Unit,Character Name,Arora Run/Set Alive Unit,Character Name,Mary O Nette Run/Set Alive Unit,Character Name,Clark Lutrinae Run/Set Alive Unit,Character Name,Drasan Winterbloom Run/Set Alive Unit,Character Name,Andras Winterbloom Run/Set Alive Unit,Character Name,Sandra Winterbloom Run/Set Alive Unit,Character Name,Asandr Winterbloom Run/Set Alive Unit,Character Name,Loud Theater Enjoyer Run/Set Alive Unit,Character Name,Emma Strider Promotional Cutout GoToNextBranch/ /None
/[And thus, the theater was not [i]entirely[/i] broken apart. "Bolt-Action Love" would show as planned, undeterred by neither ruffians nor confused critics.] ShowDialogueBox/ Continue./NextBranch

/[Clark Lutrinae is more than happy to distance himself from the Rubble Rousers. Harrien takes Clark Lutrinae under his wing, and massive arms.] Log/-VAL:Harrien Lifts Alive- and -VAL:Clark Lutrinae Alive- ClearPortraits/ IfValGoTo/Harrien Lifts Alive,=,0,BRANCH[Nobeta and Mary] IfValGoTo/Clark Lutrinae Alive,=,0,BRANCH[Nobeta and Mary] AddPortrait/Harrien Lifts,Harrien Lifts,left,,Excited AddPortrait/Clark Lutrinae,Clark Lutrinae,right,,Kind MoveCam/Harrien Lifts Continue./NextBranch

/[Nobeta and Mary have a pleasant date scheduled. They plan on bonding over a mutual appreciation for Nobeta's muscles.] ClearPortraits/ IfValGoTo/Nobeta Lifts Alive,=,0,BRANCH[Sandra Winterbloom] IfValGoTo/Mary O Nette Alive,=,0,5,BRANCH[Sandra Winterbloom] IfValGoTo/Lesbian Discussions Count,l,3,BRANCH[Sandra Winterbloom] AddPortrait/Nobeta Lifts,Nobeta Lifts,left,,Excited,10,0 AddPortrait/Mary O Nette,Mary O Nette,right,,Kind,5,0 MoveCam/Nobeta Lifts Continue./NextBranch

/[Sandra got a lot [b]lot[/b] out of this experience, apparently! She's excited to learn what it all means.] ClearPortraits/ IfValGoTo/Sandra Winterbloom Alive,=,0,BRANCH[Asandr Winterbloom] AddPortrait/Sandra Winterbloom,Sandra/Winterbloom,left,,Winking MoveCam/,,Sandra Winterbloom / / / Continue./NextBranch

/[Asandr got a lot [b]lot[/b] out of this experience, apparently! Recent developments push her enough to audition for the role of Lakshmi. Good luck!] ClearPortraits/ IfValGoTo/Asandr Winterbloom Alive,=,0,BRANCH[Arora] AddPortrait/Asandr Winterbloom,Asandr/Winterbloom,left,,Winking MoveCam/,,Asandr Winterbloom / / / Continue./NextBranch

/[Arora had a good time with the experience, and continues vibing. It's hard to get a good bigender lizard down.] ClearPortraits/ IfValGoTo/Arora Alive,=,0,BRANCH[Loud Theater Enjoyer] AddPortrait/Arora,Arora,left,,Winking MoveCam/,,Arora / / / Continue./NextBranch

/[[i]Some[/i] have learned nothing at all from the experience.] ClearPortraits/ IfValGoTo/Loud Theater Enjoyer Alive,=,0,BRANCH[Cutout] AddPortrait/Loud Theater Enjoyer,Loud Theater Enjoyer,left,,Winking MoveCam/,,Loud Theater Enjoyer / / / Continue./NextBranch

/[You even managed to save the promotional cutout of Emma Strider! The theater appreciates your efforts.] ClearPortraits/ IfValGoTo/Emma Strider Promotional Cutout Alive,=,0,BRANCH[End Slate] Continue./NextBranch
/[This is the end slate! Now, for the actors of this part of the play to...] ClearPortraits/ ShowDialogueBox/ Conintue./NextBranch

/ HideDialogueBox/ MoveUnitBy/Harrien Lifts,0,1, MoveUnitBy/Nobeta Lifts,0,1 MoveUnitBy/Mary O Nette,0,1 MoveUnitBy/Arora,0,1 MoveUnitBy/Asandr Winterbloom,0,1, MoveUnitBy/Clark Lutrinae,0,1, MoveUnitBy/Andras Winterbloom,0,1, MoveUnitBy/Drasan Winterbloom,0,1, MoveUnitBy/Sandra Winterbloom,0,1 GoToNextBranch/ / / / /None

/ HideDialogueBox/ PlayAnim/Harrien Lifts,Cast PlayAnim/Nobeta Lifts,Cast PlayAnim/Clark Lutrinae,Ability PlayAnim/Mary O Nette,Cast PlayAnim/Arora,Cast PlayAnim/Asandr Winterbloom,Cast PlayAnim/Sandra Winterbloom,Cast PlayAnim/Andras Winterbloom,Cast PlayAnim/Drasan Winterbloom,Cast GoToNextBranch/ /None

/It appears as though we need an BeforeTurn/0 for OnTurn/0 to work in exploration mode. If this dialogue is showing, something about scripting is broken, and the player will probably be stuck here. EndConvImmediately/
